page.description: The <OBJECT>.TOOLBARCHANGE() method loads and displays the selected toolbar.

argument.name: new_toolbar
argument.description: The name of the toolbar to load.

item.name: Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
